title: Alexander Costello
text:
Interests
I have been interested in making electronic music for a few years now. Here are some of the tools I’m currently using in:
Modular Synths; Elektron Gear; Ableton Live; Guitar(s); Max/MSP; Pure Data; Critter & Guitarri
I also caught the vinyl bug in 2024 …

title: Costello’s Travelling Thought Caravan
text:
“You have to play the game to find out why you’re playing the game”
I would like to use this space to begin collecting and categorizing my thoughts and hobbies. I would also like to go through some of my graduate course work to pull out and save interesting projects. I loved the MS program at Villanova and have continued to sharpen my git and quarto skills as a data scientist. One downside to working with sensitive data is the opacity of my projects so I would like to find interesting ways to explore some of the ideas and concepts I use in my current role.

title: some songs
text:
Really just testing out the workflow to create posts…..
Music session
Active Listening
Spotify Rave Classics Playlist
First song:

Original Nuttah 25 - Uk Apache, SHY FX

Interesting that the break was just a snare roll

very straightforward beat with minimal elements
Bass is left to carry the low end and snare sets the groove

On a Ragga Tip ’97 - SL2

Also simple. Kick, Snare, HH, Bass, Synth Riff, Vocals

Beep Street - Squarepusher

Man this snare roll is so sick (intro)
(1 min 20 sec) I can really hear the influence on more recent artists. For some reason, Tycho jumps to mind with this snare groove
I listened to Awake earlier today but also picked up a boards of canada vinyl the other week
